name: Arc Surfer
detailed_description:
Arc Surfer is a multiplayer, rail grinding, high speed racing, platformer, in VR. Test your skills in a beautiful, neon bathed, synthwave, retro-styled universe.

You will surf on a truly technological marvel, the Arc Board. The Arc Board is a virtual hovering disc you stand on and shift your body weight. As you surf side to side, forward or backward the Arc Board responds as if it were an extension of your body! It truly is magical. As you master the board, surfing on it no longer requires thought, it takes you where you want to go… Much like a skateboard, surfboard or snowboard.
